attributes.action: Exempt health care workers from fourteen day self isolation
attributes.additional_details: Healthcare workers (HCW) are facing many stressors at work in the pandemic. International HCWs make up for a significant proportion of the NHS. They should be able to travel and see their loved ones.
attributes.background: Test Healthcare workers for covid-19 upon return to the UK. If negative, they should be allowed to resume work without needing to self-isolate.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/554721
